LanguageData.InPrisonCell: In prison cell: For prisoner use
LanguageData.DropThingLodger: Temporary faction members will not drop their items.
LanguageData.DropThingLocked: This person refuses to drop this.
LanguageData.ExecuteColonist: Execute guilty colonist\n\nIf you toggle this on, a warden will proceed to execute this person.
LanguageData.MessageColonistMarkedForExecution: {0_labelShort} is now marked for execution. The next available warden will go execute {0_objective}.
LanguageData.RenounceTitleWillLosePermitPoints: {PAWN_nameDef} will lose {POINTS} unspent permit points with {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.RenounceTitleWillKeepPsylinkLevels: {PAWN_pronoun} will keep all {PAWN_possessive} psylink levels and psycasts.
LanguageData.SetPodLauncherTargetFuelLevel: Set target fuel level to {0}\nMax distance: {1} tiles
LanguageData.AllCaravanMembersMentalBreak: Stopped because: Everyone is in a mental break.
LanguageData.WasWornByCorpse: Tainted from being worn by a corpse.
LanguageData.CaravanDetectedRaidCountdownTip: Enemies have learned of your location. They will arrive in {0}.
LanguageData.RoomSurgerySuccessChanceFactor: Surgery success chance multiplier from room
LanguageData.ClickToSortByThisColumn: Click to sort by this column.
LanguageData.WorkPriorityShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Increase priority\nShift + right click: Decrease priority
LanguageData.WorkPriorityShiftClickEnableDisableTip: Shift + click: Enable all\nShift + right click: Disable all
LanguageData.AllowedAreaShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Set all to home\nShift + right click: Set all to unrestricted
LanguageData.CheckboxShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Check all\nShift + right click: Uncheck all
LanguageData.RideableAnimalTip: This animal is rideable. People in a caravan will ride the fastest available animals, improving the speed of the caravan as a whole.
LanguageData.CaravanBonusTip: This person provides a bonus to the caravan's speed. The speed increase is the average bonus of all of the caravan's members.
LanguageData.EncumberedCaravanTilesPerDayTip: This caravan can't move because it carries too much.
LanguageData.CreatureFollowFieldwork: Follow master while doing field work
LanguageData.PreciousLumpHostileThreat: The scanner is picking up activity around the lump. It's likely hostile.
LanguageData.GiveGiftViaTransportPodsTradeRequestWarn:
Warning: You cannot complete trade requests by using transport pods.
If you send the goods, the settlement will accept them as gifts but they will not reward you.

For trading, approach the settlement with a caravan!

Are you sure you want to gift the loaded goods to the faction?
LanguageData.ClickToViewInQuestsTab: Click to view this quest in quests tab
LanguageData.NaturalGoodwillDescription: Natural goodwill is based on faction identities and beliefs. If current goodwill is far from natural goodwill, it will slowly shift towards natural goodwill over time.\n\nAll goodwill effects are multiplied by {0} when moving towards natural goodwill.
LanguageData.PreventCuttingDesc: When on, colonists won't cut this plant.
LanguageData.UnpennedTooltip: Animal pens can be created by building a pen marker inside an enclosed area. Your handlers will bring animals to an appropriate pen. Pens can be enclosed with fences, barricades, walls, and doors.
LanguageData.NoExteriorAccess: No exterior access - Animals cannot be moved in or out.
LanguageData.DoorMustBeEnclosedByWalls: Must be connected to walls on both sides to function.
LanguageData.CannotOrderNonControlled: Cannot order characters you do not control.
LanguageData.ApparelPreventsShooting: {PAWN_nameDef} cannot use ranged weapons due to {PAWN_possessive} {APPAREL_label}.
LanguageData.MustBeActivatedByColonist: Send a colonist to activate this.
LanguageData.NoNearbyFireNoFuelUsed: No nearby fire. No fuel was used.
LanguageData.SelectNextInSquareTipController: Select next thing in same square.\n\nYou can also do this by slowly clicking the same square again.
LanguageData.HostilityReponseTip: Change how this person will react to nearby enemies when not drafted.
LanguageData.IngredientsDesc: The ingredients used to make this meal.
LanguageData.DietaryTypeDesc: The type of meal produced. Some people have preferences for specific types of meals.
LanguageData.CutAllBlightDesc: Mark all blighted plants to be destroyed. Blighted plants will not yield any food or resources and should be destroyed before the blight spreads.
LanguageData.AnimalSterilizeConfirm: Are you sure you want to sterilize {PAWN_nameDef}? Doing this will anger {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.AnimalSlaughterConfirm: Are you sure you want to slaughter {PAWN_nameDef}? Doing this will anger {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.AnimalReleaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to release {PAWN_nameDef}? Doing this will anger {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.ShowLearningHelperWhenEmptyToggleButton: Toggle visibility of the learning helper when it is empty.\n\nThe learning helper is always visible if there is a concept activated to be learned. This toggle makes it disappear when no concept is active.
LanguageData.ShowBeautyToggleButton: Toggle the beauty display.\n\nDisplays the beauty of the world as would be perceived by a character standing where the cursor is pointing.
LanguageData.ShowRoomStatsToggleButton: Toggle room stats display.\n\nDisplays room stats of the room where the cursor is pointing.
LanguageData.ShowColonistBarToggleButton:
Toggle colonist bar.

Displays icons and basic status for all colonists along the top of the screen.

You can reorder the colonists in the colonist bar by right-click and dragging them.
LanguageData.ShowColonistBarToggleButtonController:
Toggle colonist bar.

Displays icons and basic status for all colonists along the top of the screen.

You can reorder the colonists in the colonist bar by pressing the left trigger button and dragging them.
LanguageData.AutoHomeAreaToggleButton: Toggle automatically expanding the home area around new constructions.
LanguageData.AutoRebuildButton: Toggle automatic rebuild of destroyed structures in the home area.
LanguageData.CategorizedResourceReadoutToggleButton: Toggle categorized mode on the resource readout.
LanguageData.ShowAnimalNamesToggleButton: Toggle displaying animal names for tame named animals.
LanguageData.ShowFertilityOverlayToggleButton: Toggle fertility overlay.\n\nThis shows how fertile the ground is, which affects what kinds of plants can grow and how fast they grow.
LanguageData.ShowTerrainAffordanceOverlayToggleButton:
Toggle visibility of terrain affordance.

This relates to what kinds of building can be constructed at each location.

For example, some types of ground only accept light or medium buildings, but not heavy ones. Bridges can only be built on water.
LanguageData.LockNorthUpToggleButton: Lock the rotation of the camera so the north pole is always up.
LanguageData.UsePlanetDayNightSystemToggleButton: Toggle day/night lighting on the planet view.
LanguageData.ShowBasesExpandingIconsToggleButton: Toggle displaying expanding icons for settlements belonging to other factions.
LanguageData.ShowImportantExpandingIconsToggleButton: Toggle displaying expanding icons for important locations, such as your colony, quest locations, and active maps.
LanguageData.ShowWorldFeaturesToggleButton: Toggle visibility of names of landforms.
LanguageData.ShowTemperatureOverlayToggleButton: Toggle heat overlay. This shows the air temperature in each room and outdoors.\n\nColonists will be unhappy if the temperature is too high or too low. Exposure to extreme temperatures can lead to hypothermia, frostbite, heatstroke, burns, and death.
LanguageData.GameConditionsTip: Special conditions affecting the area right now.
LanguageData.ClickToJumpToSource: Click to jump to the source.
LanguageData.ClickToJumpToFlashstorm: Click to jump to the flashstorm.
LanguageData.NoStuffsToBuildWith: You have no usable materials from which to build this.
LanguageData.MustPlaceUnroofed: Cannot be placed under a roof.
LanguageData.MustPlaceUnderThickRoof: Must be placed under thick roof.
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnWall: Must be placed against a wall.
LanguageData.SomethingPlacedOnThisWall: Something is already placed on this wall.
LanguageData.CannotSupportAttachment: This building can not support attachments.
LanguageData.MustPlaceHeadOnShipBeam: Must place with head attached to ship structural beam.
LanguageData.MustPlaceNextToHopperAccepter: Must be placed next to something that needs a hopper.
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnSteamGeyser: Must be placed directly on a steam geyser.
LanguageData.MustPlaceCoolerWithFreeSpaces: Both the hot and cold sides of the cooler must be exposed.
LanguageData.MustPlaceVentWithFreeSpaces: Both the sides must be exposed for air to pass through.
LanguageData.MustPlaceAdjacentStandable: Must be placed with standable space on all sides.
LanguageData.MustPlaceNearFuelingPort: Must be placed next to a pod launcher's fueling port.
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnDrillable: Must be placed on drillable resources.
LanguageData.CannotPlaceAdjacentTrap: Cannot be placed next to traps.
LanguageData.CannotPlaceAdjacentSameDef: Cannot be placed next to another building of the same type.
LanguageData.Watermill_WaterUsedTwice: Flow reduced: Turbulence from other watermill
LanguageData.CasketWarning: Warning!\n\n{PAWN_nameDef} is your last free-standing colonist! If you let {PAWN_objective} step into that casket, you may not be able to continue playing. Are you sure you want to proceed?
LanguageData.ShipNoSettlementToReturnTo: No settlement to return to. Form a settlement first.
LanguageData.HibernateWarning:
(*Name)Charlon Whitestone(/Name) is ready to begin the reactor's hibernation recovery sequence.

He warns you that the process will take about 15 days, and the energy signature will be detectable from a long distance away.

This sort of energy signature indicates interstellar flight capability, and will attract gangs of desperate raiders and swarms of deadly mechanoids.

You will be assaulted with an intensity you've never seen. Make sure your defenses are prepared first.
LanguageData.HibernateWarningStandalone:
The reactor is ready to power up.

The process will take about 15 days, and the energy signature will be detectable from a long distance away. This sort of energy signature indicates interstellar flight capability, and will attract gangs of desperate raiders and swarms of deadly mechanoids.

You will be assaulted with an intensity you've never seen. Make sure your defenses are prepared first.
LanguageData.HibernateWarningPacifist: (*Name)Charlon Whitestone(/Name) is ready to begin the reactor's hibernation recovery sequence. He warns you that the process will take about 15 days.
LanguageData.HibernateWarningStandalonePacifist: The reactor is ready to power up. The process will take about 15 days.
LanguageData.SkillNeurotrainerDescription: A one-use super-dose of mechanites which trains a specific skill.\n\nThe dose is administered through the orbit of the eye. Once released into the brain, the mechanites quickly improve the subject's skills in a specific area, transmuting themselves into neural tissue as needed.
LanguageData.SkillNeurotrainerUsed: {USER_labelShort} used {1} neurotrainer to go from level {2} to level {3}.
LanguageData.MinifiedTreeWillDieIn: Extracted tree will die in {time} unless replanted.
LanguageData.Title: Title
LanguageData.QualityDescription: An item's quality is how well-made it is.
LanguageData.GameOverEveryoneDead: Everyone is dead or gone. This story is over.\n\nPerhaps someone else will find a use for the ruins of this place.
LanguageData.GameOverPlanetkillerImpact:
At near-lightspeed, the planetkiller weapon slammed into the ground with the force of a trillion hydrogen bombs. Like a water balloon shot with a rifle, this world liquified under the impact and sprayed its molten guts across the cosmos.

Part of {0} is now a small asteroid belt. The rest is a molten, radioactive hellscape, constantly rippling with kilometers-high planetquakes.

You did not survive.
LanguageData.GameOverShipLaunchedEnding: Your machine persona will now try to guide the ship to a safe place. It might find a prosperous planet in this system. Or, it may undertake a centuries-long journey to another star. It might even decide to hide under ice on an asteroid for a few thousand years, waiting for someone to build a new glitterworld here.\n\nYou'll find out when you wake up.
LanguageData.GameOverCreateNewWanderersText: Everyone is dead or gone. Perhaps someone will find a use for the ruins of this place.\n\nChoose new wanderers arrive at your colony and continue the story.
LanguageData.DeterioratingDueToLackOfMaintenance: Deteriorating due to lack of maintenance.
LanguageData.DeepDrillExhausted: Deep drill resources exhausted, drill automatically forbidden. Unforbid to begin mining of {0}.
LanguageData.LearningHelperTooltip: In-game tutor that aims to teach you information about topics relevant to your colony's current state
LanguageData.CompassTip: Shows the north direction. Click to rotate the camera so the north pole is up.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerButtonTip: Click to enter the planning mode where you can plan your journey and calculate distance between waypoints.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerUsingAverageTicksPerMoveWarn: Planning mode uses the default caravan speed. Your speed may vary.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerPressEscapeToReturnToCaravan: ESC: Return to the caravan formation dialog.
{Key:Cancel}: Return to the caravan formation dialog.
LanguageData.PawnTooltipPsychicEntropyDesc: Neural heat increases after using a psychic power. Surpassing the normal limit may cause a psychic breakdown lasting days.\n\nNeural heat dissipates naturally over time. This process can be accelerated by wearing eltex apparel or being in pain.
LanguageData.PawnTooltipPsychicEntropyLimit: Toggle neural heat limiter. Exceeding your heat limit may cause a psychic breakdown lasting days. It won't cause permanent damage.
LanguageData.Reward_Pawn_DropPod: a {0_age}-year-old {0_title} named {0_nameDef} will arrive in a transport pod {0_relationInfoInParentheses}
LanguageData.Reward_Pawn_WalkIn: a {0_age}-year-old {0_title} named {0_nameDef} will arrive and join you {0_relationInfoInParentheses}
LanguageData.Reward_Items: transport pods with the following resources will arrive (total value {1}):\n\n{0}
LanguageData.Reward_Goodwill: your faction relations with {0_name} will improve by {1}
LanguageData.Reward_PassageOffworld: you will be taken to the stars
LanguageData.Reward_CampLoot: you can loot everything from the camp
LanguageData.Reward_Unknown: It is unclear what will happen if you accept this quest
LanguageData.Reward_VisitorsHelp: the visitors will work and fight for you
LanguageData.Reward_ShuttleLoot: you can deconstruct and loot the shuttle
LanguageData.Reward_PossibleFutureReward: a reward possibly granted in the future
LanguageData.BladelinkAlreadyBondedDialog: A person can only bond with one persona weapon at a time.\n\nTo equip and bond with {WEAPON_labelShort}, {PAWN_nameDef}'s currently bonded weapon {BONDEDWEAPON_labelShort} must first be destroyed.
LanguageData.DamageFactor: {DAMAGE_label} damage that this creature receives is multiplied by this amount.
LanguageData.WarningBuildingCausesHostility: Caution: Placing a building here will anger {FACTION_name}!
LanguageData.RitualNobodyAttended: {0} was not completed because of lack of attendance.
LanguageData.QualityFactorTooltipUncertain: This condition may be fulfilled, depending on how things play out.\n\nIf it is fulfilled, the quality bonus will apply.
LanguageData.QualityFactorTooltipNotFulfilled: This condition is not fulfilled.\n\nThe quality bonus will not apply.
LanguageData.DragPawnsToRolesInfo: Drag and drop or left/right click to move people.
LanguageData.DragPawnsToRolesInfoController: Drag and drop or click to move people.
LanguageData.RitualBeginSlaveDesc: A slave. The human property of others.
LanguageData.RitualBeginSleepingDesc: {0_labelShort} is sleeping. If included in the event, {0_pronoun} will wake up to participate.
LanguageData.RitualBeginSleepingWarning: Some of the selected participants are sleeping. They will wake up once you start the event.
LanguageData.RitualRoleRequiresSocialRole: This position is best done by a colonist holding the social role of {0}.\n\nIf someone without this role fills this position, you won't get the following bonus(es)
LanguageData.RitualRoleCantSubstitute: No substitute available for the role of {0}.
LanguageData.RitualOutcomeQualitySpecific: {0} total quality was {1}, determined by these factors
LanguageData.RitualQualityLowWarning: Total {0} quality is below {1}. Proceeding will most likely negatively impact your colony.\n\nAre you sure?
LanguageData.AbilitySpeechDisabledNoSpot: No reachable appropriate place to speak.
LanguageData.RitualOutcomeExtraDesc_Mood: Everyone participating in the ritual gains {0} mood for {1} days.
LanguageData.RitualOutcomeNoQuality: This ritual has no quality offsets, so the best outcome is always expected
LanguageData.DateRitualNoObligation: {0} is a date-specific ritual. You'll be able to start it in {1}, on the {2}.
LanguageData.RitualOutcomeLovedOnePresentTip: Any person that {PAWN_labelShort} considers their friend or more.
LanguageData.AbilityOnCooldown: ability on cooldown. It will be available in {0}.
LanguageData.PawnIsInAggroMentalState: {0_nameDef} is in an aggressive mental state.
LanguageData.GlowerChangeColorDescription: Change the color of the light.
LanguageData.GlowerChangeColorNeedsResearch: You must research {0} to change light color.
LanguageData.ShieldPersonalTip: A personal shield that will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel. It prevents the wearer from firing out, and shuts down instantly if hit by an EMP.
LanguageData.UnrecruitableDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is so loyal to {PAWN_possessive} home that {PAWN_pronoun} will refuse to be recruited if taken prisoner.
LanguageData.PlantThingDesc: Plant a {0_label} in a chosen area.
LanguageData.BookMentalBreakMessage: Was driven into a mental break after reading {0}.
LanguageData.ContainedBooksDesc: The books currently on this bookshelf.
LanguageData.EjectBookTooltip: Remove this book from the bookshelf.
LanguageData.UnableToEnterPortal: Unable to enter {0}, destination is blocked
LanguageData.ResearchNotDiscovered: This category of research has not been discovered.
LanguageData.DesignatorFillInDesc: Designate this crater to be filled in. A colonist assigned to construction will fill it in.
LanguageData.AutoHackDesc: When enabled, researchers will automatically hack this.
LanguageData.WorldJumpToDesc: Find a colony, caravan, or quest location on the world map.
LanguageData.CommandEnterPortalDesc: Select people and items to enter the {0}.
LanguageData.CommandCancelEnterPortalDesc: Cancel loading people or items into this.
LanguageData.ProjectileInterceptorTip: A low-angle projected shield that will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel. It shuts down instantly if hit by an EMP.
LanguageData.CannotUseScannerNoBedrock: Biome does not contain drillable resources
LanguageData.CannotAcceptQuestNoMap: Cannot accept this quest without a permanent colony.
